refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if the given key or index exists in the array

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
key
Value to check.
array
An array with keys to check.

&reftitle.changelog;
&Version; &Description;
8.0.0
The key parameter now accepts bool, float, int, null, resource, and string as arguments.
8.0.0
Passing an object to the array parameter is no longer supported.
7.4.0
Passing an object to the array parameter has been deprecated. Use property_exists instead.
